dmca.title: Counterfeit Gibson Product
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Ric Olsen [mailto:Ric.Olsen@gibson.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, June 07, 2006 11:17 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Counterfeit Gibson Product
Subject: Counterfeit Gibson Product
Importance: High


Hello:
 
 We have been investigating a rather large ring in China that are
counterfeiting Gibson Guitar product, (not to mention other musical
instrument manufactures as well as other manufactured goods).
 
The following website which The Planet hosts is overtly posting and
selling counterfeit Gibson  and Epiphone product: www.longmarket.com
<http://www.longmarket.com> . We have attempted to determine the
registrants/owners of this web store to no avail as the "whois"
information has been masked.  The unlawful se of our trademarks, trade
dress, copyrights, and logos is not authorized by Gibson Guitar Corp,
its agent, or the law and we intend on prosecuting to the full extent
available.
 
We request the following:

1.        That their website be taken down immediately - at least relative
to any posts or sales bearing the Gibson  and  Epiphone logos. 
2.        That you supply us with the contacts and identities supplied by
the owners of this site 

All items bearing the Gibson and Epiphone names on the pages located at
the following addresses are counterfeit (note, from the home page where
there is infringing product showing, there are also links to the left
for Gibson and Epiphone. Click each of those):

        http://www.longmarket.com/
         
        http://www.longmarket.com/productdisplay.php?sortid=40
         
        http://www.longmarket.com/productdisplay.php?sortid=40

 
I would be happy to answer any questions you may have to prompt this
along. We are getting a few hundred calls a day now from concerned
consumers and our authorized dealers. 
 
The information in this notification is accurate, and under penalty of
perjury, and I am authorized to act on behalf of Gibson Guitar Corp
relative to these infringing and counterfeit items. 
 
Sincerely, 
 
Ric Olsen  
 
 
cc: Roxanne Khazarian, Esq
 
 
Ric Olsen
Director of Security/Loss Prevention
Gibson Guitar Corp
309 Plus Park Boulevard
Nashville, TN 37217
phone: 615 871 4500 x2431
fax: 615 884 9431
ric.olsen@gibson.com
 
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This e-mail communication and any attachments
may contain confidential and privileged information for the use of the
designated recipients named above.Any unauthorized review, use,
disclosure or distribution is prohibited.If you are not the intended
recipient, please contact the sender by reply email and destroy all
copies of the original message.To reply to our administrator, send an
email to support@gibson.com
